it.sauronsoftware.grab4j
Class WebGrabber

java.lang.Object
  it.sauronsoftware.grab4j.WebGrabber

public class WebGrabber
extends java.lang.Object

This is the grabber. The documentation about the grab4j scripting features is given inside the distribution package.

Author:
Carlo Pelliccia

Method Detail

grab

public static java.lang.Object grab(java.net.URL url,
                                    java.lang.String jsLogic)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    HTMLParseException,
                                    ScriptException
This method fetches, parses and grabs a HTML document.

Parameters:
url - The document address as an URL object.
jsLogic - The script implementing the grabbing logic, as a string of JavaScript code.
Returns:
The value returned by the grabbing script, or null if no value is returned by the script.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the document retrieving.
HTMLParseException - If the file retrieved isn't a valid HTML document.
ScriptException - If the grabbing script fails.

grab

public static java.lang.Object grab(java.net.URL url,
                                    java.io.Reader jsLogicReader)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    HTMLParseException,
                                    ScriptException
This method fetches, parses and grabs a HTML document.

Parameters:
url - The document address as an URL object.
jsLogicReader - The script implementing the grabbing logic, as a reader from which will be read the JavaScript code. Note that this reader will be closed by the method.
Returns:
The value returned by the grabbing script, or null if no value is returned by the script.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the document or the script retrieving.
HTMLParseException - If the file retrieved isn't a valid HTML document.
ScriptException - If the grabbing script fails.

grab

public static java.lang.Object grab(java.net.URL url,
                                    java.io.File jsLogicFile)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    HTMLParseException,
                                    ScriptException
This method fetches, parses and grabs a HTML document.

Parameters:
url - The document address as an URL object.
jsLogicFile - The script implementing the grabbing logic, as a file containing the JavaScript code.
Returns:
The value returned by the grabbing script, or null if no value is returned by the script.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the document or the script retrieving.
HTMLParseException - If the file retrieved isn't a valid HTML document.
ScriptException - If the grabbing script fails.

grab

public static java.lang.Object grab(HTMLDocument document,
                                    java.io.Reader jsLogicReader)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    ScriptException
This method grabs a HTML document.

Parameters:
document - The already parsed HTML document.
jsLogicReader - The script implementing the grabbing logic, as a reader from which will be read the JavaScript code. Note that this reader will be closed by the method.
Returns:
The value returned by the grabbing script, or null if no value is returned by the script.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the script retrieving.
ScriptException - If the grabbing script fails.

This method grabs a HTML document.

Parameters:

Throws:

                                    java.lang.String jsLogic)
                             throws ScriptException
This method grabs a HTML document.

Parameters:
document - The already parsed HTML document.
jsLogic - The script implementing the grabbing logic, as a string of JavaScript code.

The value returned by the grabbing script, or null if no value is returned by the script.
